Basement Freestyle Lyrics
“Basement Freestyle” is a track from Travi$ Scott’s Days Before Rodeo mixtape.

The title is reminiscent of Kendrick Lamar’s “Backseat Freestyle” from good kid, m.A.A.d. City. While unlikely to be actual… 
Read More

Deadstock sixes and shit
